pr_title: Fix broken code links in comments of SetOptions.java

timeline.message: Fix broken code links in comments of SetOptions.java

timeline.bodyText:
I don't think it's valid syntax. it should be something like:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * SetOptions objects returned by {@link #merge()}, {@link #mergeFields(List<String>)} and {@link
          
          
            
             * SetOptions objects returned by {@link #merge()}, {@link #mergeFields(List)} and {@link
          
      
    
    
  

i.e. without generic parameters.
timeline.author: vkryachko
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -26,10 +26,10 @@
 
 /**
  * An options object that configures the behavior of {@code set()} calls. By providing one of the
- * SetOptions objects returned by {@link #merge}, {@link #mergeFields} and {@link #mergeFieldPaths},
- * the {@code set()} calls in {@link DocumentReference}, {@link WriteBatch} and {@link Transaction}
- * can be configured to perform granular merges instead of overwriting the target documents in their
- * entirety.
+ * SetOptions objects returned by {@link #merge()}, {@link #mergeFields(List<String>)} and {@link

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/firebase-firestore/src/main/java/com/google/firebase/firestore/SetOptions.java b/firebase-firestore/src/main/java/com/google/firebase/firestore/SetOptions.java
index 57dc44e9..9f13a6a4 100644
--- a/firebase-firestore/src/main/java/com/google/firebase/firestore/SetOptions.java
+++ b/firebase-firestore/src/main/java/com/google/firebase/firestore/SetOptions.java

@@ -26,8 +26,8 @@ import java.util.Set;
 
 /**
  * An options object that configures the behavior of {@code set()} calls. By providing one of the
- * SetOptions objects returned by {@link #merge()}, {@link #mergeFields(List<String>)} and {@link
- * #mergeFieldPaths(List<FieldPath>)}, the {@code set()} calls in {@link DocumentReference}, {@link
+ * SetOptions objects returned by {@link #merge()}, {@link #mergeFields(List)} and {@link
+ * #mergeFieldPaths(List)}, the {@code set()} calls in {@link DocumentReference}, {@link
  * WriteBatch} and {@link Transaction} can be configured to perform granular merges instead of
  * overwriting the target documents in their entirety.
  */
